# AutoPostTeegram

**A Telegram Auto Post Package**

â€¢ `A Package Used To Post Memes, Gifs, Facts To Your Channel On Telegram`


```bash
$ python3 -m pip install autopostg
```

## Example
```To Post Anime Memes
from Stuffs import auto

x = auto()

while True:
    x.animememe(token=TOKEN, chat="@AnimeMeme")
```
